Docs.param: The question to answer.
A collection of to query.

The language of the text documents. This is the BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "es" for Spanish, etc. If not set, uses as the default. If is not set, the service default, "en" for English, is used. See for list of currently supported languages.
An optional to cancel the request.
Docs.summary: Answers the specified question using the text .
